page.title: 08WILDLIFE IN THE NEW FOREST
page.content: In the New Forest there are a lot of animals and insects around.{ We saw some spiders with eggsacks dragging behind them. Some ants were about half a cm long and some were a bit bigger.The bigger ants were the biggest ants in Europe. We saw a few forest ponies with baby foals .They looked ever so cute. They had fluffy manes and they were quite small.There were quite a few birds in the sky too,but I couldn't make out what kind of birds they were.There were some colourful {Butterflies.}They were quite interesting.Their colours were bright and gay.They were mainly purple ones.There were other colours too,but purple was the main colour. The ladybirds were quite common in the forest and other places.
